esim.esim_profile_number_tips: The sizes of eSIM profiles sold in different stores are different, so the number of profiles written to eSIM will also vary.
esim.seed_profile_tips: The seed profile is a free service provided by GL.iNet. You can see the remain data and the expiration time in the usage. You can use seed profile data to download other profiles or do initial test. If these free data are used up or expired, you also can use Ethernet or Repeater to connect the internet to download other profile.
esim.add_esim_profile_tips: Most of eSIM can only download and add once
